javax.security.identitystore.credential

Interface CredentialValidator


  • public interface CredentialValidator
    CredentialValidator provides a means for extending the IdentityStore credential validation mechanism to validate any Credential implementation against any IdentityStore implementation.

    A CredentialValidator is registered for use by the IdentityStore by annotating the CredentialValidator implementation using the CDI Qualifier Validator.

    For example, to register MyCredentialValidator to validate MyCredential against MyIdentityStore, annotate as:

    @Validator(credentialClass = MyCredential.class, identityStoreClass = MyIdentityStore.class)
    public class MyCredentialValidator implements CredentialValidator { .. }

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CredentialValidationResult validate(Credential credential, IdentityStore identityStore)
      Validate the credential against the identity store.

    • Method Detail

      • validate

        CredentialValidationResult validate(Credential credential,
                                    IdentityStore identityStore)
        Validate the credential against the identity store.
        Parameters:
        credential - The credential to validate.
        identityStore - The identity store to validate against.
        Returns:
        The result, including CredentialValidationResult.Status reporting whether validation succeeded.
